text: "Fire and Ice" is a 1981 song by Pat Benatar and is the leading single from her third studio album Precious Time. It went to number 3 in New Zealand, number 4 in Canada, number 17 in the United States and number 30 in Australia. It went on to win a Grammy for Best Female Rock Performance in 1982. Category:1981 songs Category:Pat Benatar songs
title: Fire and Ice (Pat Benatar song)
